mapper.insert: insert into tBillRecords(CreatedDateTime, TradeType, TradeStatusEnum, ClientId, PriceId, TradingSn, DeviceId, TotalFee) values(#{createdDateTime}, #{tradeType},#{tradeStatusEnum},#{clientId},#{priceId},#{tradingSn},#{deviceId}, #{totalFee})
mapper.update: update tBillRecords set TradeStatusEnum =#{tradeStatusEnum} where Id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from tBillRecords where ClientId = #{clientId} limit #{pageIndex},#{pageSize}
